author: ktf
body:
These do not work anymore since #814 and related bits that removed DaqSource. I remove both for now. I you want to have them back:

```
git cms-addpkg IORawData/CSCCommissioning
git cms-addpkg IORawData/DTCommissioning
git revert f44cba3
git revert 2fd1b25
```

@pellicci @ptcox
title: Drop Commissioning helpers DaqSource based.
